summary:
Renowned professional in International Film & Television Sales and film-distribution with over 25 years of international rights licensing and film-distribution experience in; Theatrical and television  drama series..
The Dutch Features sales agency was founded in 2012 and has grown into one of European leading Agency for mainstream Box-office hits  such as successful  family-films, thrillers and top notch drama-series such as The Godless.
In 2012 Dutch Features kicked off with a succes for Dutch TV-Drama and secured  a worldwide distribution deal with Content Media Corporation for Dutch produced miniseries: "Freddy" ( Heineken) Starring Thom Hoffman.

Van Collem additionally initiated and co-produced the Internationally succesful and highly awarded Film: “Buddha”s Lost Children” in 2006 in Thailand. 
The film has become one of the most succesful Dutch non-fiction festival-films, with more then 10 International awards and over 60.000 cinematickets sold at the Dutch boxoffice.The Film was selected as the official Dutch entry to the Academy Awards 2008, category; Best Feature Documentary.

Websites: www.dutchfeatures.com
                
                

For more information contact : 
pim@dutchfeatures.com
T: 31-(0)-647125430

Specialties: Initiated and succesfully managed several major Film and TV distribution company's, such as;  Polygram Televison Benelux, ( Now Vivendi Unversal)) and worldwide distributor; Endemol International Distribution as MD.

Co-developed and co-financed several features and non-fiction films such as one of Holland's highly awarded film documentaries: "Buddha's lost Children".

DUTCH FEATURES GLOBAL ENTERTAINMENT.

Dutch Features represents Leading European producers and is headed by industry veteran, Pim van Collem. The company’s focus is to market and license selected, high -concept European and Dutch language feature films, prime-time Drama series and Event mini-series to international distributors and International Networks and new media platforms.  

For more then three decades, Van Collem has been successful in the International licensing of feature films and Drama-series, both domestically and internationally and across all platforms; theatrical, home entertainment and television. 


Van Collem, former president of Endemol International Distribution and Polygram Filmed Entertainment Benelux, is a renowned distribution professional who is best known for marketing and selling thriving US network miniseries which were licensed  to European Broadcasters; successful titles such as the ABC networks Event Mini-series: "Joan Of Arc", starring: Jacqueline Bisset, Peter O’Toole and Shirley Maclaine and the TNT networks production successful miniseries:The Audrey Hepburn story, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt. 
In addition; Van Collem was also the architect behind the output-deal with Arnon Milchan’s renowned film and television Production Company; New Regency Enterprises, which supplied the firm with top-quality studio films, such as : “Heat” and “JFK, and “The Devils Advocate”. and became the foundation for the first historic first non studio output deal with the Dutch Public Broadcasters (NPO)',
